# title

**Instance Property**

The button’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Configuring the Button’s Attributes

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether the button is in an enabled state.

items.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the button is in an enabled state.
